subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded David Ferrer defeated Tommy Robredo, 2-6, 6-2, 6-3, and advance to the final of the Valencia Open in Spain. Ferrer will play Nicolas Almagro, who continued his bid for a third Valencia title by defeating unseeded Evgeny Korolev, 6-1, 6-4.
snippet: Top-seeded David Ferrer defeated Tommy Robredo, 2-6, 6-2, 6-3, and advance to the final of the Valencia Open in Spain. Ferrer will play Nicolas Almagro, who continued his bid for a third Valencia title by defeating unseeded Evgeny Korolev, 6-1, 6-4.
